sentences.sContent: Theoretical models for the calculation of the droplet velocity in the liquid-liquid heterogeneous mixing are reviewed. Breakage and coalescence mechanism of the droplets are analyzed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Theoretical models for the calculation of the droplet velocity in the liquid-liquid heterogeneous mixing are reviewed. Breakage and coalescence mechanism of the droplets are analyzed.
sentences.sCn: 前言： 总结了液-液非均相混合过程中的液滴运动速率计算模型，分析了液滴破碎及合并的机理。

remMethod.val: 来自coalesce (v. 联合， 合并)

trans.tranCn: 合并， 接合； 联合
